title: BookBolt 2.0 Movers and Shakers + KDP Spy, Amazon KDP Easy Keyword Research

tactics.name: Movers and Shakers + KDP Spy Keyword Research
tactics.description: Use BookBolt 2.0's Movers and Shakers to identify top-performing books, then leverage KDP Spy for keyword discovery and volume analysis.
steps: Select a category and time frame (daily/weekly/monthly) in Movers and Shakers
Analyze BSR rank, sales estimates, and ICN number for top books
Use Book Scout (reverse search) to extract keywords from successful titles
Filter keywords by search volume and competition score in KDP Spy
Iterate by searching related keywords to find unique opportunities
caveats: Requires manual filtering to avoid keyword saturation
source_quotes: You can see the estimate monthly sales, the BSR rank, the ICN number...

heuristics.name: High-Volume Keyword Prioritization
heuristics.condition: If a keyword has monthly search volume > 1000 and competition score < 50, prioritize it
source_quotes: We can filter them by total items count or search volume.

claims.statement: KDP Spy provides related keywords with monthly search volume and competition data
source_quotes: You can see the estimate monthly search volume and the competition score...

niche_patterns.example: budget planner + financial tracking + monthly goals
niche_patterns.description: Target specific niches with clear problem-solution constraints for keyword optimization
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Aligns with high-intent search terms and low-competition keyword opportunities
source_quotes: We can find unique keywords just for this search term.
